articles.title: My Journey as LOPAM
articles.excerpt: From building Sneaklin to working at Nomba, here's my story as Pariola Ololade (LOPAM) - the challenges, wins, and lessons learned along the way.
articles.content:
Hi, I'm Pariola Ololade, but most people know me as LOPAM. Three years ago, I started building Sneaklin as a side project. I had no idea it would become the foundation of my career as a frontend engineer.

Today, Sneaklin handles 30+ daily orders and has processed over $10k in revenue. But more importantly, it taught me what it means to build production software that real people depend on.

articles.title: Building Sneaklin: My E-commerce Journey
articles.excerpt: How I built and maintained Sneaklin from scratch - the real challenges, technical decisions, and what it taught me about being a developer.
articles.content: Sneaklin was my first major project, an e-commerce platform I built from the ground up. It was a crash course in full-stack development, but my primary focus was always the frontend experience.

projects.title: Sneaklin — E-commerce Platform
projects.summary: Built and maintained a production e-commerce app handling 30+ daily orders and $10k+ revenue. Focus: responsive UI, performance optimization, checkout UX.
impact: Reduced page load times by 25% through code refactors
projects.takeaway: I focus on practical performance wins and shipping customer-facing features.
projects.problem: Sneaklin needed a robust e-commerce platform that could handle high daily transaction volumes while maintaining excellent performance and user experience across all devices.
responsibilities: Built responsive product catalog and shopping cart interfaces
Implemented checkout flows with payment gateway integration
Optimized asset loading and code splitting for faster page loads
Collaborated with backend team on API integration
projects.approach: I architected the frontend using React with a component-based approach, focusing on reusability and maintainability. Performance was critical, so I implemented lazy loading for images, code splitting for routes, and optimized bundle sizes. For the checkout flow, I prioritized clarity and trust signals to reduce cart abandonment.
projects.whatIdDoDifferently: I'd implement a state management solution like Zustand from the start to better handle complex cart and checkout states.

projects.title: Nomba — KYC & Transaction UX Improvements
projects.summary: Enhanced KYC workflows and transaction UIs—added rejection reasons, pagination, search, and verification fixes, improving compliance and reducing errors.
projects.takeaway: I work well with backend teams to solve reliability and UX problems in fintech.
projects.problem: The KYC workflow needed better user experience and clearer feedback for rejected applications, while transaction tables required better performance and search capabilities.
responsibilities: Enhanced KYC rejection workflow with detailed reasons
Implemented pagination and search for transaction tables
Fixed verification bugs and improved data consistency
Collaborated with compliance team on UX improvements
projects.approach: I focused on creating clear, intuitive interfaces that made complex financial data accessible. I implemented real-time search and pagination to handle large datasets efficiently.
projects.whatIdDoDifferently: I'd implement better error handling and loading states from the start to improve user experience during data processing.

projects.title: UniChow — Wallet & Payment Integration
projects.summary: Implemented wallet top-up using Paystack and built user-facing payment flows for a campus food app.
impact: Delivered a wallet top-up flow to production
Improved UX for payments and order flows
projects.takeaway: I build payments & integrations that prioritize security and usability.
projects.problem: Students needed a seamless way to manage their funds and make purchases on the campus food app, requiring secure payment integration and intuitive wallet management.
responsibilities: Integrated Paystack payment gateway for wallet top-ups
Built user-facing wallet balance and transaction history interfaces
Implemented secure payment flows with proper error handling
Connected frontend to Firebase backend for real-time updates
projects.approach: I prioritized security and user trust in the payment flow, implementing clear visual feedback for every step and robust error handling for failed transactions.
projects.whatIdDoDifferently: I'd implement better transaction status tracking and push notifications for payment confirmations.
